How are you planning on using Danswer?: How are you planning on using Danswer?
Search / Chat with Knowledge - descripti: If you're looking to search through, chat with, or ask  direct questions of your organization's knowledge, then this is the option for you!
Secure ChatGPT - description: If you're looking for a pure ChatGPT-like experience, then this is the option for you!
Step 2: Connect Data Sources - descripti: Connectors are the way that Danswer gets data from your organization's various data sources. Once setup, we'll automatically sync data from your apps and docs into Danswer, so you can search through all of them in one place.
To start using Danswer as a secure ChatG: To start using Danswer as a secure ChatGPT, we just need to configure our LLM!

If...we default to use OpenAI: If you haven't done anything special with the Gen AI configs, then we default to use OpenAI.
If you want to change the key later or c: If you want to change the key later or choose a different LLM, you'll be able to easily to do so in the Admin Panel / by changing some environment variables.
